about_the_game:
Project Madras is a small Action-Packed Open world game set in the heart of Chennai, India.

Explore Where Tradition Meets Modernity

Project Madras offers a gameplay experience steeped in the rich cultural tapestry of Chennai. Set in the capital city of TamilNadu where world's oldest language "TAMIL" thrives, Project Madras invites you to not just play a game but to be part of a dynamic culture of India.

Roam freely around the shores of Marina, Streets of Mount Road, Monuments of Chennai covering iconic landmarks and neighborhoods, all while pursuing a story that adds purpose to your exploration.

The hero of the game is the city

Chennai is a diverse city with lots of moving parts and lots of stories to uncover!
Immerse yourself in the world of Project Madras, seamlessly transitions from the vibrant days to mysterious nights, from scorching heat to pouring rains.
Explore the complete spectrum of human experiences, encountering 1000’s of authentic NPCs that bring the city to life.
Project Madras is not just a game, it's a celebration of India’s culture, language, emotions and spirit.

Playtests are opening up soon stay tuned!

Project Madras is an ambitious project that we've been working on for the past few Years. We hope you'll join us on this journey and support us as we work to create the best Indian indie game possible!
